Summary: 3 fast flashing objects moving west to east in and out of the clouds
divs: Sighting Details3 fast flashing objects moving west to east in and out of the clouds above Portland international airport, Columbia rive and Troutdel airport last seen flying north,north east . Object 1. Flashing what looked like to be bright white fast flashing light (lights are Strobe like) flying fast no sound. Object 2. Flashing what looked like to be bright white fast flashing light (lights are Strobe like) flying fast no sound. Object 3. Flashing what looked like to be bright red fast flashing light (lights are Strobe like) flying fast no sound. All 3 objects appeared in same order as the description 1,2, and 3.... I just had a thought to look up and i did. out- side my home talking on the phone. Of the way lights looked i thought maybe they where helicopters, however moving way to fast to be helicopters. It felt like i was suppose to see them. Kept flying north, north east
